title: Castaway ? Parkour Adventure
briefDescription: You crashed! You reach an abandoned bee island! Nobody will help you here. Rest and go on an adventure. Defeat Parkour, collect mysterious eggs and ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
You crashed! You reach an abandoned bee island! Nobody will help you here. Rest and go on an adventure. Defeat Parkour, collect mysterious eggs and jump on a bee and fly away! On the island you will find mysterious collapsed houses. These are the homes of people who once lived here before the outbreak of bee vulcan that destroyed almost everything! Former residents left mysterious eggs. Collect them! Bees have inhabited this island. One of them flies away, escape from this place. It is unknown when the vulcan erupts again
Welcome to the bee island of Castaway Parkour. Rest and go! On this map you must reach a bee to fly away from here! 5 mysterious eggs are hidden on the map, find them!
The water is salty in the sea and you want to drink. Water is good on this island. Drink and move on

title: Time Adventures Part 1 Prototype
briefDescription: You are a famed explorer and have built a large collection of priceless artefacts. You are always looking for adventure and when the ultimate offer ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
You are a famed explorer and have built a large collection of priceless artefacts. You are always looking for adventure and when the ultimate offer comes you can?t refuse, Time Travel?
Travel back in time and collect artefacts? but all is not as it seems as you soon find yourself battling time travelling enemies from another time!
You are a famed explorer and have built a large collection of priceless artefacts. You are always looking for adventure and when the ultimate offer comes you can?t refuse, Time Travel?!
you need to collect some artefacts for the Quantum Research Institute then you free to collect for your own private collection. But when you encounter Resistance what will you do? Enjoy this epic sci-fi adventure map
Travel through multiple ages such as the stone age, the medievil age and the victrorain eara
In the stone age you have to recover the redstone geode. to do this you talk with a cave man, climb a mountain, fight in a underground base and battle a wizard.
in the medievil eara you must complete multiple small tasks to buy an invisibility potion so you can steal the sword of king Johnny the second.
in the victorian eara you must steal the crown gewls, But the time traveling wizard is on your tail and he has got the help of the police. After an epic chase on horse back you find yourself in the distant future where humnity is confined to bunkers because of a long ago war. Again you complete many small tasks around the bunker(feel free to mess with the stuff in there too, complete the parkour for an epic reward) Go out of the bunker and reactivate the surveillance station. finally reboot you time machine and sit tight for my next release!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
This map has a few side features see if you can find them
In the bunker feel free to mess with their stuff but also not the experiment room. you can bring in more test subjects, deploy cleaners, deploy stimulus and reset it at your will. it?s a great way to have fun and mess about. it is located in the Bunker.
By the way killing the wizard is optional
I don?t want to walk you through the map so i will end it here enjoy.
PS
this map in in development and as currently unfinished but there is substantial gameplay in this edition. stay tuned for the next update

title: Un-Pointless Map [UPDATED]
briefDescription: Welcome to Un-pointless MapWhere everything is very unpointless because it's pointless, it's typically not a typo, it's the name of the map. In other words, ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Welcome to Un-pointless Map
Where everything is very unpointless because it?s pointless, it?s typically not a typo, it?s the name of the map. In other words, this map contains puzzles, obstacles, riddle and a bit of a troll, so watch out. This map has 15 levels. Feel free to speed run or make a video of this map as long as you give it credits.
Subsribe to my Youtube channel ?Zhaox?
Follow me on Twitter @TheFaderTone
Unique Feature:
? Anti-Cheat System, this mechanic will make you stop from cheating, the activation is in the map. I?m not stopping you from cheating it is in your own decision if you want to cheat or not. That?s why made this mechanic for you to make a decision. Not to stop you.

When you play the map, you should be in a super white box. If the texture didn?t load, please report it to the comments. I will add a link to download the custom made texture pack.
And speaking of texture pack, I hereby credit Freelsify for this awesome texture pack that fits well in the point of my map.
And yes, I made this texture myself, but it?s originally from him.
This map was made in 1.14.60 Minecraft Pocket Edition. Every command is limited unlike java version. So, this map only uses simple commands.
This is all the levels that you will get, every level has its own difficulty, it depends on you if you can beat that one level fast.
Level 1:
Door: Super Easy
? The super duper easy level amongs all.

Level 2:
Villager: Difficulty : Easy
? You will never guess what you will do to the villager

Level 3:
Craft a Hopper: Semi-Medium
? Simple, just craft a hopper

Level 4:
Connect Hopper to chest : Semi-Medium
? That?s the purpose of crafting the hopper.

Level 5:
Button Quiz 1 + 5 : Semi-Medium
? You basically apply the math to the button

Level 6:
Button Chase : Semi-Medium
? Chase the button until you caught it

Level 7:
What will you do? : Hard
? Patience is the answer to this level

Level 8:
Parkour: Hard
? Every puzzle map has a parkour, don?t forget that

Level 9:
Button Troll: Semi-Medium
? Stupid button teleporting everywhere

Level 10:
Speed Run: Hard
? Run to the next level, literally

Level 11:
Don?t touch the red: Hard
? Don?t touch the red, or else, consiquences(not really)

Level 12:
Invisible Maze: Hard
? A totally normal maze, nothing to worry

Level 13:
High Jumps: Hard
? Jump all the way to the top

Level 14:
Fight the Zombie: Easy
? Say hello to the easiest mob fight

Level 15:
Craft a button: Semi-Medium
? To end the level perfectly

title: ApexCroc Random PvP
briefDescription: The world is a pvp based mini-game where 2 random people are made to fight to the death with random items in this gladiator type game. ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
The world is a pvp based mini-game where 2 random people are made to fight to the death with random items in this gladiator type game. The game is built to have short fun rounds where every round is different.
This world is playable for 2+ people meaning you can play with you and all of your friends, Once the game has started 2 random people will be teleported into an arena to fight to the death whilst the rest of the people spectate from a safe distance. Both fighting players will be given a random weapon with a random enchant and a random miscellaneous item. This way every game that you play is unique and fun. Rounds last anywhere from 30 second to 3 mins so they?re quick rounds so you can pack your afternoon with heaps of fun.

crawledImageUrls.text:

Where you can feel the MMORPG game in your minecraft, and a map created specifically for Third Person Back.
here you can adventure to follow the story line or raise the level to the highest in this map, fight enemies like Elf, Orcs, Dragons, and many other enemies, collect a lot of swords. being a merchant collecting goods and then selling them on the market, this is some picture of World of Arcadia.
